Dear {{employee.first_name}}


We at Prompt Equipments Pvt. Ltd. understand that our employees are the essential factor for our successful business. We also feel that all achievements should be noticed and acknowledged. Therefore, on behalf of the company, we are pleased to inform you that you have been promoted from {% if promoted_designation %} {% if promoted_designation[0].current != promoted_designation[0].new %} {{promoted_designation[0].current or employee.designation}} to {{promoted_designation[0].new}} {% endif %} {% endif %} effective from {{doc.promotion_date}}.


Your KRA will be modified according to your new designation. All the other terms and conditions of your employment will be governed by the company policy.


Please accept our personal congratulations on this well-deserved recognition of your continuing excellent contributions and commitment towards the company. We look forward to long-term mutual growth.


Congratulations and best wishes!


Please acknowledge the acceptance of this letter.


Sincerely,
